name: CoreIdentityRegistry
description: CoreIdentityRegistry. Core storage for Ethereum identities in the FNDR system This serves as the core storage and contains minimum business logic Identity level override codes should be interpreted by TransferController Additional overrides should be implemented by additional IdentityRegisties and called by TransferController.

eventDecorators.name: IdentityStatusChanged
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

eventDecorators.name: Paused
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

eventDecorators.name: PauserAdded
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

eventDecorators.name: PauserRemoved
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

eventDecorators.name: Unpaused
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

eventDecorators.name: WhitelistAdminAdded
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

eventDecorators.name: WhitelistAdminRemoved
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

eventDecorators.name: WhitelistedAdded
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

eventDecorators.name: WhitelistedRemoved
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vault is liquidated.

functionDecorators.name: addAccount
functionDecorators.description: User can associate secondary accounts by proving they own the account.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: the ether account to be added.

parameterDecorators.name: hash
parameterDecorators.description: hash of the message that was signed.

parameterDecorators.name: identity
parameterDecorators.description: the identity to be associated with.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: the ether address to look up.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: add additional lookup scope of a given security token, 0 if only global status is desired.

functionDecorators.name: pause
functionDecorators.description: Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state.

functionDecorators.name: paused
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: setStatus
functionDecorators.description: Sets status of an identity, for different scenarios: if identity exist, simply set global status or token status if tokenScope is given if identity does not exist, create identity mapping and set status, if tokenScope then also set token status.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: sets status in token scope, 0 if only global status is desired.

functionDecorators.name: setStatuses
functionDecorators.description: Sets status of an identity, for different scenarios: if identity exist, simply set global status or token status if tokenScope is given if identity does not exist, create identity mapping and set status, if tokenScope then also set token status.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAddresses
parameterDecorators.description: array of tokens to set status.

functionDecorators.name: unpause
functionDecorators.description: Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state.
